spec_data.Name: perl-Proc-Queue
spec_data.Description:
This module lets you parallelise a perl program using the fork, exit, wait
and waitpid calls as usual but without taking care of creating too many
processes and overloading the machine.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 10:35:07 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Limit the number of child processes running
